reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful for the Price point

reviews.content: Let’s be clear, this is an “inexpensive” watch.That being said it is a good quality watch for this price point.Easy to operate, light works great, it’s not bright and that’s fine with me as it works fine in the dark.
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States September 8, 2024

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect watch
reviews.author: Susan d.
reviews.content: Durable, can get wet,easy to read,light for seeing at night,date year month,big numbers for clock reading. What more can I ask for.he loves it! No more asking me for the time.helps him remember the year date and month. Ladies if your hubby is having trouble remembering the easy thing of month time date ,then this is your answer.
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States October 7, 2024

reviews.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good price/value ratio!!!
reviews.author: Jose V. Llovera
reviews.content: These Lavaredo watches have a good price-value ratio.They look well built, I would like the strap better without strange holes, however I don't dislike it, they have an attractive design, they are large watches, they are fashionable, and their operation is simple, these are economical, they support 5ATM, they use simple batteries CR2025, and they have a Stopwatch and Blue Light to see the time at night.The back case is made of stainless steel.I bought three watches.Thank you
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States July 23, 2024

reviews.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great For Outdoors
reviews.author: Debbie Carr
reviews.content: Nice comfortable watch and display is very easy to read outdoors but indoors the display is very dark and hard to see. Must use backlight button to see display indoors and not very handy.The pictures and descriptions of this watch on Amazon are rather misleading. Will decide within 30 days to return or not.

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Still ticking after a year
reviews.author: JD Rocker
reviews.content: I bought this watch her on AMZ for $19 in March 2023. I have 6 main criteria for watches: Keep good time, somewhat rugged, stylish, water resistant, easy to read, and night light. Does all. I wear it in the shower, and no fogging thus far. I'm really impressed. One of the best products I've ever bought here.
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States July 23, 2024

reviews.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars A good watch with basic functions

reviews.content: This is a great watch for the Price I paid. It has the basic features, is easy to use, and the large numbers are easy to read. However, it only has the current time and date, a stopwatch, and an alarm, no countdown feature. But I suppose I could use my cell phone for that.

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LAVAREDO Mens Digital Watch Sports Military Watches Waterproof Outdoor Chronograph
reviews.author: honestandtrue
reviews.content: LAVAREDO Mens Digital Watch Sports Military Watches Waterproof Outdoor Chronograph Wrist Watches for Men with LED Back Ligh/Alarm/Date. Like a good basic watch with a large easily read screen. Use these primarily for work however I'm starting to enjoy wearing these on my down time. Like the bright turquoise color and it does make a statement. The bright LED backlight works well. Like the optional hourly chime feature. Fits well on wrist and the band is the perfect thickness. The band easily confirms to your wrist. I own several of these watches. Like the large buttons and they are easily pushed. No loose or shaky parts. This is a solid watch and lightweight. The bold round face with thick protective plastic looks like it could take a fall at great distance or hard hit easily. The screen looks thick as well. Doesn't look like it would be scratch resistant but for the price this is not an issue. I left the protective plastic on for extra protection. The buckle on the strap is large is easily used. I've tried smartwatches and I find I like these watches better. Was a bit hesitant on buying but very happy I chose too. Dont use these for swimming but they definitely are water resistant. I would like to buy one of these in all red and all white. If there was a red and black camo option I would buy that as well. This is a very solid well fitting watch.
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States September 7, 2023

content.product_name: L LAVAREDO Mens Digital Watch Sports Military Watches Waterproof Outdoor Chronograph Wrist Watches for Men with LED Back Ligh/Alarm/Date
